description: Allows the IT admin to set which branch a device receives their updates from. As of 1903, the branch readiness levels of Semi-Annual Channel (Targeted) and Semi-Annual Channel have been combined into one Semi-Annual Channel set with a value of 16. For devices on 1903 and later releases, the value of 32 is not a supported value.
name: BranchReadinessLevel

options.description: {0x2}  - Windows Insider build - Fast (added in Windows 10, version 1709)
options.name: {0x2}  - Windows Insider build - Fast (added in Windows 10, version 1709)
options.displayName: {0x2}  - Windows Insider build - Fast (added in Windows 10, version 1709)

options.displayName: {0x4}  - Windows Insider build - Slow (added in Windows 10, version 1709)

options.description: {0x8}  - Release Windows Insider build (added in Windows 10, version 1709)
options.name: {0x8}  - Release Windows Insider build (added in Windows 10, version 1709)
options.displayName: {0x8}  - Release Windows Insider build (added in Windows 10, version 1709)

options.description: {0x10} - Semi-annual Channel (Targeted). Device gets all applicable feature updates from Semi-annual Channel (Targeted).
options.name: {0x10} - Semi-annual Channel (Targeted). Device gets all applicable feature updates from Semi-annual Channel (Targeted).
options.displayName: {0x10} - Semi-annual Channel (Targeted). Device gets all applicable feature updates from Semi-annual Channel (Targeted).

options.description: 2 {0x20} - Semi-annual Channel. Device gets feature updates from Semi-annual Channel. (*Only applicable to releases prior to 1903, for all releases 1903 and after the Semi-annual Channel and Semi-annual Channel (Targeted) into a single Semi-annual Channel with a value of 16)
options.name: 2 {0x20} - Semi-annual Channel. Device gets feature updates from Semi-annual Channel. (*Only applicable to releases prior to 1903, for all releases 1903 and after the Semi-annual Channel and Semi-annual Channel (Targeted) into a single Semi-annual Channel with a value of 16)
options.displayName: 2 {0x20} - Semi-annual Channel. Device gets feature updates from Semi-annual Channel. (*Only applicable to releases prior to 1903, for all releases 1903 and after the Semi-annual Channel and Semi-annual Channel (Targeted) into a single Semi-annual Channel with a value of 16)

options.description: {0x40} - Release Preview of Quality Updates Only.
